item.title: Recover SQL innodb Database
item.description:
How to recover an SQLÂ innodb db with docker. When I moved this wordpress to it new hosting a did not have any good backup of the db. And i only got the mysql files from /var/lib/mysql.

 

So to get the site back without to much work I want to see if I could get the sql files mounted into a mysql docker and recverd to the export a .sql file.
